"Dualdre": "...Mm? Doesn't look like your Class is Braver."
"Gonna have to get you to sign up as a Braver at the Class Counter first. Gets the formalities out of the way, y'know?"
"While you're there, give Braver's Class Skills a good looking-over. Commit 'em to memory."
"But hey, I might as well tell you what the Class is all about while you're here."
"Bravers are a Class geared toward excelling at both close- and long-ranged combat."
"With a Katana for close-quarters, and a Bullet Bow for long distance, we can adapt to any situation out in the field."
"Our attacks might seem simple on the surface, but that's what makes it such an art."
"Just like any other class, Class Skills are your bread and butter. First, you should master \"Brave Combat\"."
"I'll give you this assignment for now, so go try it out."
